Name.label: Rare hereditary metabolic disease with peripheral neuropathy

TextSection.Contents: A rare sub-group of porphyrias characterized by the occurrence of neuro-visceral attacks with or without cutaneous manifestations. Acute hepatic porphyrias encompass four diseases: acute intermittent porphyria (the most common), variagate porphyria, hereditary coproporphyria, and hereditary deficit of delta-aminolevulinic acid dehydratase (extremely rare).
